inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AppPageViews
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| extend Day = startofday(TimeGenerated)
| extend PageLoadTime = todouble(DurationMs) / 1000
| extend PageType = iff(Name has "(HMP", "Programme offering page", iff(Name has "List of", "List of all Accredited Programmes page", iff(Name has "Home","Home page","IndivIdual Programme page")))
| summarize avg(PageLoadTime) by Day
| render barchart

content.Query:
AppPageViews
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where OperationName != "/"
| where OperationName != "/programmes"
| extend Day = startofday(TimeGenerated)
| extend PageLoadTime = todouble(DurationMs) / 1000
| summarize avg(PageLoadTime) by Day

partHeader.title: Average page load times per day

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AppPageViews
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| extend Day = startofday(TimeGenerated)
| extend PageLoadTime = todouble(DurationMs) / 1000
| extend PageType = iff(Name has "(HMP", "Programme offering page", iff(Name has "List of", "List of all Accredited Programmes page", iff(Name has "Home","Home page","IndivIdual Programme page")))
| summarize avg(PageLoadTime) by Day
| render barchart

content.Query:
AppPageViews
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| extend Day = startofday(TimeGenerated)
| extend PageLoadTime = todouble(DurationMs) / 1000
| where OperationName != "/"
| where OperationName != "/programmes"
| where OperationName != "/autherror"
| extend PageType = iff(Url has "find", "Find", 
iff(Url has "assess", "Assess",
iff(Url has "refer","Refer","Other")))
| summarize avg(PageLoadTime) by Day, PageType

partHeader.title: Average page load time by user journey

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AppPageViews
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| extend Day = startofday(TimeGenerated)
| extend PageLoadTime = todouble(DurationMs) / 1000
| extend PageType = iff(Name has "(HMP", "Programme offering page", iff(Name has "List of", "List of all Accredited Programmes page", iff(Name has "Home","Home page","IndivIdual Programme page")))
| summarize avg(PageLoadTime) by Day
| render barchart

content.Query:
AppPageViews
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where OperationName != "/programmes"
| where OperationName != "/"
| extend loadTimeSec = todouble(DurationMs) / 1000
| where loadTimeSec > 3
| where Name has "Accredited Programmes"
| project Url, page_load_time_in_s = loadTimeSec, time_of_event = TimeGenerated
| top 20 by page_load_time_in_s desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AppPageViews
| where AppRoleName == "hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui"
| extend PageError = iif(Name == "HMPPS Accredited Programmes - Error",true,false)
| extend Day = startofday(TimeGenerated)
| summarize  CountOfPageError = countif(PageError == true) by Day
| render timechart  with (ymin=0)

partHeader.title: Number of times error screen is displayed per day

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
requests
| extend success = tobool(success)
| where cloud_RoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where client_Type == "PC"
| where name !in ('GET /metrics', 'GET /ping', 'GET /health')
| where operation_Name !contains 'GET /assets/'
| summarize
    succeeded = sumif(itemCount, success == true),
    failed = sumif(itemCount, success == false)
    by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| render timechart

content.Query:
requests
| extend success = tobool(success)
| where cloud_RoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where client_Type == "PC"
| where name !in ('GET /metrics', 'GET /ping', 'GET /health')
| where operation_Name !contains 'GET /assets/'
| extend Day = startofday(timestamp)
| summarize
    succeeded = sumif(itemCount, success == true),
    failed = sumif(itemCount, success == false)
    by Day
| render timechart

partHeader.title: Number of successful and failed UI requests per day

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
AppRequests
| where AppRoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui'
| where Name !in ('GET /ping', 'GET /health', 'HEAD /', 'GET /metrics')
| where Name !startswith 'GET /assets'
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| extend Day = startofday(TimeGenerated)
| extend userName = tostring(parse_json(Properties).username)
| extend caseload = tostring(parse_json(Properties).activeCaseLoadId)
| where isnotempty(caseload)
| where isnotempty(userName)
| where Success == True
| where userName !in ("P_BELL", "3ebbaa0f-ea27-4190-9c33-6842d0aa2057", "EG006619")
| summarize PageViewCount = dcount(Id), UniqueUsers = dcount(userName), UniqueSessions = dcount(SessionId) by Day
| render columnchart

partHeader.title: Page view counts, overall, by session and users

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
requests
| where cloud_RoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-api'
| where name has "health"
| extend hour = datetime_part("hour", timestamp)
| where hour between (09 .. 18)
| order by timestamp desc
| order by timestamp desc
| extend Day = startofday(timestamp)
| summarize 
    succeeded=sumif(itemCount, success == true),
    failed=sumif(itemCount, success == false)
    by Day
| render timechart

content.Query:
union 
(
    requests
    | where cloud_RoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-api'
    | where name has "health"
    | extend Day = startofday(timestamp)
    | summarize 
        totalRequests = sum(itemCount),
        succeeded = sumif(itemCount, success == true),
        failed = sumif(itemCount, success == false)
        by Day
    | extend availability = 100.0 * succeeded / totalRequests
    | project Type = "Accredited Programmes API", Day, availability
),
(
    requests
    | where cloud_RoleName == 'hmpps-nomis-prisoner-api'
    | where name has "health"
    | extend Day = startofday(timestamp)
    | summarize 
        totalRequests = sum(itemCount),
        succeeded = sumif(itemCount, success == true),
        failed = sumif(itemCount, success == false)
        by Day
    | extend availability = 100.0 * succeeded / totalRequests
    | project Type = "Nomis Prisoner API", Day, availability
),
(
    requests
    | where cloud_RoleName == 'hmpps-prisoner-search'
    | where name has "health"
    | extend Day = startofday(timestamp)
    | summarize 
        totalRequests = sum(itemCount),
        succeeded = sumif(itemCount, success == true),
        failed = sumif(itemCount, success == false)
        by Day
    | extend availability = 100.0 * succeeded / totalRequests
    | project Type = "Prisoner Search API", Day, availability
),
(
    requests
    | where cloud_RoleName == 'hmpps-assess-risks-and-needs'
    | where name has "health"
    | extend Day = startofday(timestamp)
    | summarize 
        totalRequests = sum(itemCount),
        succeeded = sumif(itemCount, success == true),
        failed = sumif(itemCount, success == false)
        by Day
    | extend availability = 100.0 * succeeded / totalRequests
    | project Type = "ARNS API", Day, availability
),
(
    requests
    | where cloud_RoleName == 'hmpps-external-users-api'
    | where name has "health"
    | extend Day = startofday(timestamp)
    | summarize 
        totalRequests = sum(itemCount),
        succeeded = sumif(itemCount, success == true),
        failed = sumif(itemCount, success == false)
        by Day
    | extend availability = 100.0 * succeeded / totalRequests
    | project Type = "Manage users", Day, availability
)
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
requests
| where cloud_RoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-api'
| where name has "health"
| extend hour = datetime_part("hour", timestamp)
| where hour between (09 .. 18)
| order by timestamp desc
| order by timestamp desc
| extend Day = startofday(timestamp)
| summarize 
    succeeded=sumif(itemCount, success == true),
    failed=sumif(itemCount, success == false)
    by Day
| render timechart

content.Query:
union 
(
    requests
    | where cloud_RoleName == 'hmpps-accredited-programmes-api'
    | where name has "health"
    | where timestamp >= ago(3d)
    | summarize 
        totalRequests = sum(itemCount),
        succeeded = sumif(itemCount, success == true),
        failed = sumif(itemCount, success == false)
        by bin(timestamp, 1h)
    | extend availability = 100.0 * succeeded / totalRequests
    | project Type = "Accredited Programmes API", Hour = timestamp, availability
),
(
    requests
    | where cloud_RoleName == 'hmpps-nomis-prisoner-api'
    | where name has "health"
    | where timestamp >= ago(3d)
    | summarize 
        totalRequests = sum(itemCount),
        succeeded = sumif(itemCount, success == true),
        failed = sumif(itemCount, success == false)
        by bin(timestamp, 1h)
    | extend availability = 100.0 * succeeded / totalRequests
    | project Type = "Nomis Prisoner API", Hour = timestamp, availability
),
(
    requests
    | where cloud_RoleName == 'hmpps-prisoner-search'
    | where name has "health"
    | where timestamp >= ago(3d)
    | summarize 
        totalRequests = sum(itemCount),
        succeeded = sumif(itemCount, success == true),
        failed = sumif(itemCount, success == false)
        by bin(timestamp, 1h)
    | extend availability = 100.0 * succeeded / totalRequests
    | project Type = "Prisoner Search API", Hour = timestamp, availability
),
(
    requests
    | where cloud_RoleName == 'hmpps-assess-risks-and-needs'
    | where name has "health"
    | where timestamp >= ago(3d)
    | summarize 
        totalRequests = sum(itemCount),
        succeeded = sumif(itemCount, success == true),
        failed = sumif(itemCount, success == false)
        by bin(timestamp, 1h)
    | extend availability = 100.0 * succeeded / totalRequests
    | project Type = "ARNS API", Hour = timestamp, availability
),
(
    requests
    | where cloud_RoleName == 'hmpps-external-users-api'
    | where name has "health"
    | where timestamp >= ago(3d)
    | summarize 
        totalRequests = sum(itemCount),
        succeeded = sumif(itemCount, success == true),
        failed = sumif(itemCount, success == false)
        by bin(timestamp, 1h)
    | extend availability = 100.0 * succeeded / totalRequests
    | project Type = "Manage users", Hour = timestamp, availability
)
| render timechart

partHeader.title: API availability per hour (for the last three days)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
traces
| where cloud_RoleName in ("hmpps-accredited-programmes-api", "hmpps-accredited-programmes-ui")
| where message has 'is of interest'
| summarize count() by bin(timestamp, 1d)
| order by timestamp desc

content.Query:
traces
| where cloud_RoleName  == "hmpps-accredited-programmes-api"
| where message has 'is of interest'
| summarize count() by bin(timestamp, 1d)
| order by timestamp desc

partHeader.title: Domain events where prisoner was of interest to ACP
partHeader.subtitle: ie Prisoner update messages processed

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
traces
| where cloud_RoleName == "hmpps-accredited-programmes-api"
| where message has 'interest to ACP'
| extend Action = 
    iff(message has 'is of interest', 
       "update",
        "not update")
| summarize count() by bin(timestamp, 1h),Action

partHeader.title: update prisoner domain event messages buy hour
partHeader.subtitle: update means an ACP person was updated, not update means the person is not in ACP
